channel.title: Rights And Points Go Back To 0 [Help]
channel.description:
Hey, So yesterday I added dicing rights and premium points but when I give someone dicing rights and they log in they have it they log out and they don't have it and same thing for premium points if I give 100 they have it log out and in they don't have it please help? I added everything where I should I am not dopey and know where to add. Also if this helps in the character files it just says dicingrights0 where is says isdonator = 0 and I placed it in correct and premiumpoints are premiumpoints0 not premiumpoints = 0
Thanks, Mr Rushed

item.title: Rights And Points Go Back To 0 [Help]
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Mr Rushed:

OOPS, I forgot to change numbers, Thanks so much, I forgot because I just copied the donor points and donor rights one and pasted under it thanks so much…

No problem. If you ever see a string cut short, that’s the reason why.

Read full topic

item.title: Rights And Points Go Back To 0 [Help]
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Mr Rushed:

}characterfile.write("premiumPoints = ", 0, 13);

In that string (for both) change the 12 to 15 and the 13 to 16.

facepalm There’s guides about this everywhere, dude.

Read full topic

item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Put it with the Pk Points and I’m not sure if you already have it added but if not add it. But from what your saying is its not saving so I don’t think you have it added or I’m pretty sure it would be saving cause I added my own Pk Points, Vote Points, Donator Points, PC Points, Slayer Points etc. to mine and they all save.

item.title: Rights And Points Go Back To 0 [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Playersave.java:

} else if (token.equals("dicingRights")) { p.dicingRights = Integer.parseInt(token2);

}characterfile.write("dicingRights = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.dicingRights), 0, Integer.toString(p.dicingRights).length()); characterfile.newLine();

}else if (token.equals("premium-points")) { p.premiumPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

}characterfile.write("premiumPoints = ", 0, 13); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.premiumPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.premiumPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Player.java:

BUMP!! HELP??
